text: Rero ikiringo cabo kigeze, nimubane nabo mumahoro, canke mwahukane nabo mumahoro meza ntangere, kandi habe ivyabona bibiri vy’imvuga kuri muri mwebwe, kandi muhagarike ivyabona kubera Imana, uko niko atumwa umwe mubemera Imana yiwe y’ukuri hamwe n’umusi w’imperuka, n’uwutinya Imana yiwe y’ukuri imugirira inzira y’uburokoke
